name: Saber Final Release (pls read desc)
description:
im sorry, the game is really scuffed (its not finished). i hope you enjoy whats left of it. :)

PLS CLICK THE SCREENSHOTS to learn the controls, idk

Heads up there is no pause menu, nor is there a controls menu too

W = jump

A/D = left and right

Shift = speed dash

double tap W = double jump

TIP: double tap W super fast to super jump (you'll need it later in the game)

there are only 3 levels, so once u finish the last level. quit tbh idk

GG gamer
